summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Bagley Avenue and Corliss Avenue, each from North 41st Street to North 45th Street; North 41st Street, from Meridian Avenue to Eastern Avenue; North 44th Street, from Meridian Avenue to 1st Avenue Northeast; and East 44th Street from 1st Avenue Northeast to 5th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing together with the necessary drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 913 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
